body:
So this Idea came up in my head about making a MCZone Album.
Post Your MCZone Photos

ALBUM:
http://bit.ly/MCZoneAlbum

UPDATE 1:
Its very interesting how in 1 minute you can get 8 viws just by putting the word MCZone in the Title.

UPDATE 2:
I just made an Imgur Album with all the photos you guys are posting c:
http://bit.ly/MCZoneAlbum

UPDATE 3:
I found some screenshots on my school computer :D adding them to the Album.

replies.body:
This is not exacly a picture, it's a video from where i found Avicus (when it was called McZone of course)
The guy speaks spanish. Don't try to understand what he says just be nostalgic about how it looked before and how it changed =)

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QkhIM__6khI

So yeah, i was on McZone once. One day i was borring and then i remember that video. Thats all!

replies.body: Beta Nexus was awesome. Even though it only had Candoria, it was still fun because most of the fighting happened on the ground instead of the bridge. I think they should bring back multiple spawns in Candoria. Makes it more interesting :p
